title: System update paused- "waiting for Wi-Fi"
content:
I have a notification for the March update, it says "system update paused. To continue, connect to WiFi". However, the phone has no SIM card, so it's continually connected to WiFi.

If I click on it, same thing - "Download paused, waiting for WiFi." The phone is in airplane mode, with only WiFi on. 

I've been able to download updates before, so this is new.
